title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
May 10, 2019
On Friday, May 10, 2019, the President signed into law:H.R. 1222, the “Target Practice and Marksmanship Training Support Act”, which expands the availability of Federal grants for States to facilitate the construction and expansion of public target ranges.
